VI. INTERNATIONAL EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTING
NAEB will have primary responsibility for International exchange of consultants,
overseas visits by educational broadcasters, end all international affairs not
directly concerned with broadcast programs and the planning, production, distri¬
bution, and transmission thereof.
NETRC, onithe other hand, will have the primary responsibility for International
affairs which are directly concerned with broadcast programs and the planning,
production, distribution, and transmission thereof.
VII. mgOmNg MMPES
As the recognized professional and trade organizations in educational broadcasting,
NAEB has the primary responsibility in the entire area of professional services
and will be looked to for the continuation and - hopefully - the expansion of
such necessary activities as:
Placement service
In-service training
Internships
Management training fellowships
Labor-management consultation service
International exchange fellowships
Liaison with teachers of radio and television
Liaison with teacher training institutions in better utilization
of radio and TV in education.
In special instances, limited workshop or conference sessions related to specific
network operations may be conducted by NETRC exclusively for staff members of
affiliated stations. In such special cases, - NETRC will advise NAEB of its plans
so that all training activities in the field may be properly coordinated.
VIH. CIX>?*» RELATIONSHIP ORGANIZATIONALLY
In addition to the close cooperation and mutual understanding which has been evident
on the part of all NAEB and NETRC officers and staff immediately involved in the present
discussions and which gives excellent promise of smooth working relationships In the
future, two specific procedural suggestions have been made.
(1) NETRC intends to Invite the President of NAEB to be a guest at all regular
Affiliates Meetings, and also to be in attendance at all meetings of the NETRC Affiliates
Committee called by the Center.
(2) NAEB is exploring the possibility of allowing some similar Center representation
NAEB board meetings.
